microTxt: Need a machine for a short period of time, for an emergency, or for an event outside of your microbrewery? We are happy to help you and offer you the best price for all your requirements! Contact us now
partnerTxt: Le temps d'un fut is looking to expand its network and we would be proud to count your microbrewery in our network. Our partnerships are win-win, you have access to a rental service of machines to propose to your customers without having to manage the equipment and its distribution. Go even further and let us distribute your kegs directly. For all inquiries, please contact us !
companyTitle: Professionals of the event industry and communities
companyTxt: <text>Give your customers quality products served in the best possible way. Reduce your costs and increase your profits by serving glasses instead of cans. You will also help reduce waste at your events. </text><box> <text as='cite' > It is generally considered that a person drinks an average of 2 to 3 glasses of beer (or 0.5 to 0.75 liters) during a party. So if you're planning a party for a few hours with 20 to 30 people, you should plan on about 20 to 30 liters of beer for the evening. The choice of a keg becomes very interesting here.</text> </box> <text> We can help you in the search for a keg at the best price ! Wedding, private event, corporate, sports, ... .  Offer your guests quality products without exploding your budget! </text> </box>
